scrollprompt.content: Scroll down to learn more about me...

aboutme.title: About me
aboutme.content:
My name is Tillmann Menzer.
I am 16 years old and currently study in 11th grade of the Fanny-Leicht-Gymnasium in Stuttgart.

In my freetime I love tech tinkering.
I play around with various programming languages and technologies, with my interest ranging from Hardware to Software and beyond.

I also manage the school's website together with two fellow students and contribute to various other points in school life.

- French (B1; since 2019)

subdesc.web: since 2022: Member of the WebAG (managing the school's website)
subdesc.rewr: 2022 - 23: Rewrite of the entire school website (more below)
subdesc.roborace23: 2023: Placed 21st (of 55) in the roborace competition of Uni Stuttgart
subdesc.roborace24: 2024: Placed 9th (of 46) and 3rd of all student teams in the roborace competition of Uni Stuttgart

bogy.title: sprinteins, Stuttgart
bogy.desc: One-week internship as part of the 'BOGY'-programme in 10th grade

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: In my freetime, I love working on tech projects to improve my skills and ideally create a positive impact. Here’s a small selection of them:

fanny-wp.title: Fanny-WP
fanny-wp.desc: The Wordpress theme for the official website of my school (created with two other fellow students)

notion-webuntis.title: Notion WebUntis
notion-webuntis.desc: Easily synchronize your WebUntis timetable to Notion! Using the Notion- and the WebUntis API

dls-playersearch.title: DLS Player Search
dls-playersearch.desc: A website to search the unofficial player database of the popular mobile game Dream League Soccer

euro-cga.title: EURO24 - CGA
euro-cga.desc: A website to that played the song 'Major Tom' by Peter Schilling whenever Germany scored during the EUROs 2024

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.desc: The crazy website that you're currently visiting ;) Built and designed completely from scratch

todo.title: To-Do
todo.desc: A rather simple ToDo-App that I built during my internship at sprinteins (more info above)

spotify2mp3.title: Spotify2mp3
spotify2mp3.desc: A set of Python scripts that automatically convert entire Spotify playlists into mp3 files at once
